about_the_game:
CINEVR is a virtual, immersive and social Movie Theater to hang out with friends and watch videos.

CINEVR brings the Movie Theater at home to watch videos in 2D, 3D and 360° either on demand, in private rooms with friends or during daily public screenings.

PUBLIC SCREENINGS
Each week, 4 movies in theaters (2D and 3D) every evening at 9 p.m CET.

VIDEO CATALOG ON DEMAND
Explore our video catalog on demand in virtual reality!
2D, 3D and 360° videos in several languages including subtitles.
Watch movies alone or create a private room to watch movies with your friends!

AMAZING IMAGE QUALITY
Movies on demand are encoded by us in 1080p with a very high bitrate to offer the best image quality in VR.

SPATIALIZED AUDIO
Whatever the number of audio channels, all our environments surround you with spatialized 360° sound.

SOCIAL AND CROSS PLATFORM
Create or join private/public rooms to watch videos with up to 9 people regardless of your VR headset (Oculus Go, Samsung Gear VR, Oculus Rift and HTC Vive).
Send emojis and chat to interact with your friends and other people.

PLAYER WITH LARGE AUDIO/VIDEO SUPPORT
Our player is compatible with a large number of audio and video codecs, video formats (HD, Full HD and 4K) and video types (2D, 3D-Side by Side, 3D-TopBottom, 180 °, 360 °).

LOCAL VIDEOS
Play videos from your computer or your home network (SMB). Audio tracks and subtitles are automatically recognized by our player.

THEMATIC SCENES
Personalize your experience with our 6 thematic scenes:
  • Movie theater
  • Beach in the moonlight
  • 60s drive-in
  • Scary haunted house
  • Spaceship
  • Antic theater

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD R9 290 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
